CardNode.Name: Heroes Journey 1: Raiding Party
CardNode.Description: Your peaceful farm life is shattered by the chittering cries of goblins smashing their way into your house.

CardNode.Name: Heroes Journey 2: Village Rescue
CardNode.Description: You arrive at the village only to find it in flames. Quick, rescue anyone you can!

CardNode.Name: Heroes Journey 3: Goblin Shaman
CardNode.Description: At the center of the village stands a savage goblin shaman, the small beast directing the goblin hoard. Take your revenge on him.
